org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io

Class AcidOutputFormat.Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.AcidOutputFormat.Options
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Enclosing interface:
    AcidOutputFormat<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V>

    public static class AcidOutputFormat.Options
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Options to control how the files are written

      • statementId

        public AcidOutputFormat.Options statementId(int id)
        Since:
        1.3.0 This can be set to -1 to make the system generate old style (delta_xxxx_yyyy) file names. This is primarily needed for testing to make sure 1.3 code can still read files created by older code. Also used by Comactor.

      • finalDestination

        public AcidOutputFormat.Options finalDestination(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path p)
        Parameters:
        p - where the data for this operation will eventually end up; basically table or partition directory in FS
